text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>7. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Merck-und Lesens-würdige Tractat, genandt, der Fluchtige Pater aus Rom</TITLE> (worinnen, nach dem Buch Danielis und der Offenbahrung Johannis, von denen nächst bevorstehenden schrecklichen Gerichten GOttes, und wie das Evangelium in Occident erlöschen und in Orient unter Türcken Juden und Heyden aufgehen werde, auch von dem Ende der Welt, ausfährlich und nachdrücklich gehandelt wird) ist wiederum in den Berichthauß zu haben <PRICE>das Stuck ß 4. ß.</PRICE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":3,"explanation":"Made three corrections: 1) Fixed the unclosed parenthesis in the title by adding an opening parenthesis before \"worinnen\" and removing the closing parenthesis from within the TITLE tag, 2) Fixed various corrupted Unicode characters (√ª → ü, √∂ → ö, etc.) to their proper German characters, 3) Changed the incorrect tag PRIZE to PRICE which is the proper tag for price information in book advertisements."}

parsed.explanation: Made three corrections: 1) Fixed the unclosed parenthesis in the title by adding an opening parenthesis before "worinnen" and removing the closing parenthesis from within the TITLE tag, 2) Fixed various corrupted Unicode characters (√ª → ü, √∂ → ö, etc.) to their proper German characters, 3) Changed the incorrect tag PRIZE to PRICE which is the proper tag for price information in book advertisements.
